engine.rendering

Class LightMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.LightMap

  • public class LightMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A texture storing lighting information.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new LightMap with a generated light

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightMap

        public LightMap(IRenderDevice device,
        int radius,
        Color color)
        Creates a new LightMap with a generated light
        Parameters:
        device - The device used for rendering.
        radius - The radius of the generated light.
        color - The color of the generated light.

      • LightMap

        public LightMap(IRenderDevice device,
        int width,
        int height,
        double scale)
        Creates a blank LightMap with a certain width and height.
        Parameters:
        device - The device used for rendering.
        width - The width of the LightMap.
        height - The height of the LightMap.
        scale - How much this LightMap is scaled when drawn.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Releases this object. This should be called when the object will no longer be used, and no methods or fields should be used after this method is called.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String fileName,
        java.lang.String outputFileFormat)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves this LightMap to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name and path of the desired file.
        outputFileFormat - A string representing the image format for output. For example, "png" and "jpg" are valid options.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the image cannot be saved to a file.

      • addLight

        public void addLight(LightMap light,
            double startX,
            double startY,
            double endX,
            double endY,
            double texStartX,
            double texStartY,
            double texEndX,
            double texEndY,
            Color color)
        Adds another light to this LightMap.
        Parameters:
        light - The light to draw
        startX - The start location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        startY - The start location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endX - The end location on X, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        endY - The end location on Y, normalized into the range (-1, 1)
        texStartX - The location in the LightMap on X where pixels should begin being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texStartY - The location in the LightMap on Y where pixels should begin being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texEndX - The location in the LightMap on X where pixels should finish being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        texEndY - The location in the LightMap on Y where pixels should finish being copied, normalized into the range (0, 1)
        color - The color to mask the light with.
